segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, diligently polishing a plate without a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It strikes me as odd that she hasn’t noticed the water spilling over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a twinge of concern as the water creeps closer to her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are full of energy, and their playful mischief makes my heart race a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy perched precariously on the stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stance looks unstable, and I fear the moment he tips backward into the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the girl stands there, eager and expectant, as if she knows she’s breaking the rules.
segments.speaker: PAR
